code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BulkCreateModal=_ref=>{let{showBulkCreate,setShowBulkCreate,currentLocation,currentUser,events,setEvents,isLoggedIn}=_ref;const[bulkEventText,setBulkEventText]=useState('');const processBulkEvents=()=>{if(!isLoggedIn){alert('Please log in to create events');return;}const lines=bulkEventText.split('\n').filter(line=>line.trim());const newEvents=[];lines.forEach((line,index)=>{const parts=line.split('|').map(part=>part.trim());if(parts.length>=4){const newEvent={id:Date.now()+index,title:parts[0]||"Event ".concat(index+1),date:parts[1]||'2024-12-01',time:parts[2]||'18:00',location:parts[3]||'TBD',city:currentLocation.city,state:currentLocation.state,category:parts[4]||'Community',price:parts[5]||'Free',description:parts[6]||'Event details to be announced.',image:"https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=".concat(Date.now()+index),attendees:Math.floor(Math.random()*100),organizer:currentUser.name};newEvents.push(newEvent);}});if(newEvents.length>0){setEvents([...events,...newEvents]);setBulkEventText('');setShowBulkCreate(false);alert("Success! Added ".concat(newEvents.length," events successfully!"));}};if(!showBulkCreate)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-overlay",onClick:()=>setShowBulkCreate(false),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bulk-create-container",onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bulk-create-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"bulk-create-title",children:"Bulk Add Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setShowBulkCreate(false),className:"close-button",children:"\u2715"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"bulk-create-instructions",children:["Enter one event per line in this format:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"Event Name | Date (YYYY-MM-DD) | Time (HH:MM) | Location | Category | Price | Description"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"bulk-create-example",children:["Example:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"Team Meeting | 2024-11-15 | 09:00 | Conference Room A | Business | Free | Weekly team sync"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"bulk-create-location",children:["Events will be added to: ",currentLocation.city,", ",currentLocation.state]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"bulk-create-input",placeholder:"Paste your events here...",value:bulkEventText,onChange:e=>setBulkEventText(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bulk-create-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bulk-create-cancel",onClick:()=>setShowBulkCreate(false),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bulk-create-cancel-text",children:"Cancel"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bulk-create-submit",onClick:processBulkEvents,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bulk-create-submit-text",children:"Add Events"})})]})]})});};export default BulkCreateModal;
